alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:08AM CST until January 16 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise quickly later today into Friday, cresting near 14 feet on Sunday. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 4.0 Thu 8 am CST 5.9 11.7 13.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued by this evening at 915 PM CST.
